item.title: Would you rather play on a (317-602)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:13, topic:341444”]317 because we know the most about it.

@elve, you hate everything don’t you?

You hate mods (Don’t even say you likes some, you bash mods all the time for the dumbest fucking reasons, get over your fucking self, our mods do a wonderful job and aren’t picked in a gay way), you hate other peoples work (some times, but that’s most of this community), you hate the rep system (That’s most likely the only good thing you hate), you hate most of this community, you hate moparscape. I don’t feel like adding any more.[/quote]

Did i say i “hate” 317s? I said its an awful revision as a private server.

There were about 50k players who played back then.

I don’t really like the new graphics, and jagex is making their game worse, so 503+ is pretty bad.

I hate the mods who abuse their powers and come in every thread and troll it, you can report them to admins, but nothing is done, because they are their butt buddies, I am here for this community to help it advance in some way.

CoonHunter:

I think its funny, that you think the 317 is awful, yet the 420+ is just a 317, after 103 of Jagex’s updates. I still have yet to see a legit reason why you hate the 317-377 gen clients.

Lol you provided a bad argument Coon. 103 updates, is A TON. Thats 2-3 years of updates. I’m talking about 317 Runescape, but if you played during this era, it was incredibly boring, the best weapons were whips which were 5-10m, and that took forever to get.

Now during the 400 eras, the economy is getting better and better, skills are improving, player count is rising, more and more weapons are coming out.

377 Era, was actually a pretty good era, with Pest Control, it was stuck on 377 for a few months believe it or not (from what i remember)

All in all, the 317s that are out are complete shit, which are all leeched, if you provide a “old school 317” they are boring because the best weapon is a whip.

Now if they are “474 look alike” they have, awfully done models, interfaces, and sprites.
People are hard coding everything they can in, yet they don’t know the harm it is (not harm, but just its hard coding).

Now don’t get all offensive because I don’t like the 317s. (333/357/377)

ONTOPIC: 317, because the rest are garbage.

Read full topic

and do skillcape emotes and stuff like that really matter to you or should I forcus mainly on the economy/game-play of the server?

Im pretty much trying to make the best pking server out there. I refuse to put it online until its completely DONE
